preface.title: About this Document
preface.para: This document is written in docbook with the hope that it will provide a good test case of a common usage of FO created by docbook. The information is then processed by fop to produce a PDF document.

It is hoped that this document can be used as a basis for designing a new layout system for FOP so that it can handle all necessary situations when deciding line breaks, page breaks and spacing. It should also allow for the easy implementation of different writing modes and character sets.
